mapper.select: -- DataArchDao.selectPackInfoList SELECT PKG_FUL_NM ,PKG2_NM ,PKG3_NM ,PKG4_NM ,PKG_HNM ,PKG_DESC ,USE_YN ,date_format(REG_DTM,'%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%S') AS REG_DTM ,REG_USR_ID ,date_format(UPD_DTM,'%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%S') AS UPD_DTM ,UPD_USR_ID FROM TDACM0001 WHERE PKG2_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchValue}),'%') OR PKG3_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchValue}),'%') OR PKG4_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchValue}),'%') OR PKG_FUL_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchValue}),'%') OR PKG_HNM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchValue}),'%') OR PKG_DESC LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchValue}),'%') ORDER BY PKG_FUL_NM
-- DataArchDao.selectPackInfoCnt SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TDACM0001 WHERE PKG_FUL_NM = #{PKG_FUL_NM}
mapper.delete: -- DataArchDao.deletePackInfo DELETE FROM TDACM0001 WHERE PKG_FUL_NM = #{PKG_FUL_NM}
